predicate.note: Frames file for 'click' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.3.2, Framenet entries Motion noise and Perception noise.

example.name: both args
example.text: Several times, Chinese guards have pointed their automatic rifles at young children of U.S. diplomats and clicked the trigger.

example.name: ergative
example.text: John's alarm clock clicked loudly on his bedside stand.
